name: Mobile Bridge Project featuring Artemis S.B.S
blurb: A full sized 6 player spaceship bridge built on a mobile platform, using Artemis Spaceship Bridge Simulator software.

rewards.reward: Thank you for your support!  You've helped make the MBP a reality!

Limited Edition MBP Crew Badge \u2013 These limited edition custom lapel badges give a stylish nod to Artemis S.B.S. and commemorate the build at the same time.  They come in three varieties, and match the color/insignia of each station.  Feel like a real crew member with these attractive badges!  Please choose either Captain, Science, or Tactical.  Also, each badge comes with a ticket to play, a value of $10.

Basic Crew T-Shirt \u2013 These shirts are cool, whether you plan to wear them to play or not!  Each features the color and insignia of its respective station.  If pledging for just one, please specify which design you prefer.  Also, each shirt comes with a ticket to play, a value of $10.

Limited Edition MBP Crew Badges, Set of 3 \u2013 These limited edition custom lapel badges give a stylish nod to Artemis S.B.S. and commemorate the build at the same time.  They come in three varieties, and match the color/insignia of each station.  Feel like a real crew member with these attractive badges!  You will receive one of each design - Captain, Science, and Tactical.  Also, everyone pledging for this reward will receive two tickets to play, a value of $20.

Deluxe Crew T-Shirt \u2013 For those with deluxe taste, these long sleeved shirts feature the insignia of each station, printed in its respective color, along with a little attitude on the back to let everyone know what your station of choice is all about.  If pledging for just one, please specify which design you prefer.  Also, each deluxe shirt comes with a ticket to play, a value of $10.

Limited Edition MBP Crew Badges, Full Crew Set \u2013 These limited edition custom lapel badges give a stylish nod to Artemis S.B.S. and commemorate the build at the same time.  They come in three varieties, and match the color/insignia of each station.  Feel like a real crew, each member sporting their own stylish badge!  You will receive two of each design - enough to outfit an entire crew.  This reward also includes 3 tickets to play, a value of $30.

Basic Crew T-Shirts, Full Set \u2013 Outfit your entire crew, or be prepared to man any station!  You will receive one of each 6 designs when pledging for this reward.  A full set of shirts comes with 3 tickets to play, a value of $30.

Deluxe Crew T-Shirts, Full Set \u2013  Your crew will look great when each sporting their station's colors.  Or get all six designs for yourself.  Each full set of deluxe shirts comes with three tickets to play, a value of $30.

MBP Dedication Plaque \u2013 This one we're really proud of.  This custom dedication plaque is made from laser engraved acrylic, and mounted with aluminum LED standoffs to give it a unique illuminated, floating design that will look cool wherever you put it.  It also looks great when not illuminated, with an etched glass appearance.  Only 150 plaques will be made, and all are exact duplicates of the plaque that will appear in the Bridge itself.  The plaques will come with 6 tickets to play (a value of $60) so you and your friends can get in some serious simulation time at an upcoming event!

Your Name on the Plaques (and a plaque!) - 30 backers will be able to have their names laser etched alphabetically on each plaque that will be made.  Their names will be listed under \u201cCaptains\u201d in the \u201cContributing Commissioners\u201d section of the plaque.  Your pledge will also earn you a copy of the plaque, so you can point your name out and make your friends go O.O\r\n\r\nThe plaques will come with 6 tickets to play (a value of $60) so you and your friends can get in some serious simulation time at an upcoming event!

Mini-Deluxe Package \u2013 The first of our deluxe packages gets you all the sweet swag, for a little less.  It includes: A dedication plaque, a set of six Deluxe T-Shirts, a set of 6 MBP Crew Badges, and $120 worth (12) of tickets to play.

Deluxe (Admiral's) Package \u2013 This is the ultimate reward package.  The 20 backers choosing the Admiral's Package will receive everything in the Mini-Deluxe Package, but will also have their names inscribed on each plaque under \u201cAdmirals\u201d in the \u201cContribution Commissioners\u201d section of the plaque.  Again, this comes with $120 worth (12) of tickets to play.

Game Night at Your Place! - We'll park the trailer at your place (or wherever else you want it!) for a whole day (morning till midnight, or maybe even later) of spaceship simulator action!  And you can invite all the people you like - the MBP will be yours for unlimited missions for the whole day.  Regrettably, this offer is only good for residents of California/Nevada, lucky bums.
